segments.text: I haven't gone to the interview yet . It's tomorrow . I am so nervous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . You should do fine . You have the experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remember , they want someone who works well with people . You've got to show them how easy-going and personable you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , I'll keep that in mind .
segments.speaker: S2
